articles.title: Former Willow head pastry chef brings back forgotten flavours at her own dessert parlour, Catkin - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Soh Hui Shan is reviving the concept of dessert omakase at her parlour, Catkin, which she opened after leaving her job as head pastry chef at Hong Kong Street restaurant Willow.
articles.content: Foodies were shocked when the news broke that Soh Hui Shan had left her job as head pastry chef at the Hong Kong Street restaurant Willow. Since the opening of the charming modern Singaporean restaur… [+2074 chars]

articles.title: Women and men mistakenly given different advice to prevent heart disease - EurekAlert
articles.description: Women are told to improve their lifestyle to prevent heart disease while men are advised to take statins. That’s the finding of a study presented today at ESC Asia, a scientific congress organised by the European Society of Cardiology (ESC), the Asian Pacific…
articles.content: Singapore – 3 December 2022:  Women are told to improve their lifestyle to prevent heart disease while men are advised to take statins. That’s the finding of a study presented today at ESC Asia, a sc… [+3365 chars]

articles.title: Oh Canada! Why is HSBC leaving its fifth biggest market? - South China Morning Post
articles.description: HSBC’s sale of its Canadian business to Royal Bank of Canada for US$10 billion jettisons a business that has been profitable for a decade. What comes next for the UK-based lender as top shareholder Ping An piles on pressure to spin off its Asian operations?

articles.title: 'It's been 3 long years': ZoukOut returns with a bang at Sentosa - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Dance music festival ZoukOut returned with a bang after a three-year hiatus at Siloso Beach on Sentosa. The first night of the two-day dusk-to-dawn festival on Friday (Dec 2) saw partygoers dancing along to a line-up of electronic dance music arti…
